page.title: 09RELIGION 1
page.content: THERE ARE THREE CHAPELS IN OUR AREA. SARON, AINON AND RHYDDINGS. SARON IS SITUATED JUST AFTER THE BIG DIP AT THE TOP END OF BRYNCOCH. IT IS A CONGREGATIONALIST CHAPEL. AINON IS TO BE FOUND AT THE END OF ELIAS ROAD, NEXT TO THE PARK. AINON IS A BAPTIST CHAPEL. RHYDDINGS CHAPEL IS BUILT A THE OPPOSITE SIDE OF THE JUNCTION NEAR LLYGAD YR HAUL. UNFORTUNATLY THE WINDOWS HAVE TO BE COVERED WITH WIRE BECAUSE OF VANDALS. RHYDDINGS CHAPEL IS A CONGREGATIONALIST CHAPEL. ON THE WHOLE BRYNCOCH'S CHAPELS ARE WELL ATTENDED AND SUNDAY SCHOOLS ARE HELD EVERY SUNDAY AFTERNOON.
